requirements.summary: Update the contact email address displayed on the Contact page to gocodezone@googlegroups.com
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page displays gocodezone@googlegroups.com as the contact email
The email is displayed in the alternative contact methods section
The email address is clickable as a mailto link

file_operations.description: Update the email address in the alternative contact methods section to gocodezone@googlegroups.com and ensure it is displayed as a clickable mailto link
